name: Spira Carry On Spinner Limited Edition

features: Designed to meet global carry-on sizing requirements of most major airlines (Always check with your airline regarding carry-on regulations before travel)
Easily pack and organize thanks to the unique split-case construction that allows the carry on to open ﬂat for 50/50 access to each compartment
Contents are held securely in place with compression straps and a zip-away privacy panel with additional organization pockets
Protect and organize a 17" laptop, 12.9" tablet and other valuables in the dedicated business compartment with padded slip pockets
Keep belongings safe with integrated TSA lock
Stable navigation from a smooth telescoping handle and V-channel trolley system that retracts into a zip-away pocket when not in use
Ultra-smooth mobility attained from a custom 8 spinner wheel system
Quickly access small go-to items in the front zippered pocket
Polished and durable design includes oversized YKK zippers and durable twill fabric
Easily lift and rearrange in overhead bins with oversized top, side and bottom grab handles
Includes exclusive, limited-edition shoe bag from designer and humanitarian Mariama Camara
